pr_title: Fix bug caused by setting SW_OAL_ENGINE_DEBUG=Y.

timeline.message: Fix only envoy related classes are generated after setting SW_OAL_ENGINE_DEBUG=Y

timeline.bodyText: What do you mean? This is always true.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: Create a oal-rt folder only when the first oal script is loaded.
replies.author: Ax1an
